answers.answer: First, it concerns me that you say you have high blood pressure.  Are you not taking any medication to manage it at this time?  Secondly, assuming you have diabetus type two (not juvenile onset type 1), did you know that diabetes type two can often be reversed if you get the proper diet and excercise and lose any excess pounds if you are carrying any?With your heart rate, was it high prior to your being upset and afraid?  Because anxiety can elevate your heart rate.  Also, was this pulse taken while you were at rest?  Because if it was while you were being active or walking about, that might perfectly normal.  Also, regarding your sinus problem, did you know that a number of the sinus medications can cause a rapid heart rate?  Are you taking any sinus medication?

question: hello,im 40 years old.  i have high bloodpressure and diebeties and sinus porblem.i just noticed my heart is high over hundred.im so upset and depress .please can somebody get back to me as soon as possible.im feeling really afraid and deppressed
title: heart
